Article Title: RR vs GT Highlights: Vaibhav Suryavanshi's record-breaking ton powers Rajasthan Royals to thumping win against Gujarat Titans
Article Text:
Vaibhav Suryavanshi celebrates his record-breaking ton in Jaipur. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Is Vaibhav Suryavanshi the future star of Indian cricket? Not sure yet Maybe, let's see Absolutely

NEW DELHI: Rajasthan Royals ' 14-year-old sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi stole the show on Monday with a breathtaking 101 off just 38 balls against Gujarat Titans at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur. In an innings studded with 11 sixes and seven fours, the teenager shattered multiple records and led the Royals to a commanding eight-wicket win with 25 balls to spare.Chasing a daunting target of 210, Suryavanshi and Yashasvi Jaiswal (unbeaten on 70 off 40 balls) put on a whirlwind 166-run opening stand in just 11.5 overs, dismantling a Titans attack boasting Mohammed Siraj, Ishant Sharma, Prasidh Krishna, Rashid Khan, and Sai Kishore.The highlight was Suryavanshi's 35-ball century, making him the youngest player to score a hundred in senior T20 cricket at just 14 years and 32 days. He surpassed Maharashtra's Vijay Zol, who previously held the record at 18 years and 118 days. Suryavanshi also became the fastest Indian to an IPL century, breaking Yusuf Pathan's 37-ball record set in 2010.Suryavanshi's blitz made a mockery of the chase and ensured the Royals' slim playoff hopes remained alive. They climbed to eighth place with six points, while Gujarat Titans slipped to third after suffering their third defeat in nine games.Earlier, Shubman Gill 's 50-ball 84 and Jos Buttler's 26-ball unbeaten 50 had set up what seemed a formidable total for the Titans. However, once Suryavanshi started launching balls into the stands, there was little the Titans could do to stem the onslaught."His hitting was tremendous," said Titans skipper Gill after the match. Jaiswal, the Royals' senior opener, summed it up simply: "Incredible, one of the best innings I have seen. I just told him to keep going."While India has seen prodigies fade under the weight of early fame, Suryavanshi's rare talent is a gift that needs careful nurturing. It will be interesting to see what is in store in the next chapter of this extraordinary story.
Article Summary: Rajasthan royals beat gujarat titans by eight wickets in ipl. Teenager vaibhav suryavanshi scores 101 off just 38 balls. He is the youngest player to score a hundred in senior t20 cricket.

Article Title: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi's century moves Rahul Dravid out of his wheelchair
Article Text:
Image credit: IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Vaibhav Suryavanshi’s record-breaking century at just 14 — what impressed you more? His achievement at just 14 years old His explosive 35-ball century

NEW DELHI: Vaibhav Suryavanshi , just 14 years old, lit up the Swaiman Singh Stadium as he hammered the Gujarat Titans bowlers to become the youngest-ever centurion in IPL history. The prodigy from Samastipur raced to his maiden century in just 35 balls, playing a sensational knock for Rajasthan Royals . He eventually scored 101 off 38 deliveries before being dismissed by Prasidh Krishna. Suryavanshi received a thunderous standing ovation from the crowd as he walked back to the pavilion.He became the youngest batter ever to score an IPL century at the age of 14 years and 32 days. His knock was studded with 11 enormous sixes and seven fours.The moment he reached his century was pure magic — it wasn’t just the fans and his teammates in the dugout celebrating; even Rajasthan Royals head coach Rahul Dravid rose from his wheelchair to applaud the young sensation. Cheers, roars, and applause echoed all around the stadium for the remarkable teenager.The record of fastest century in IPL belongs to former West Indies batter Chris Gayle , who had brought up his triple figure mark in 30 balls for Royal Challengers Bengaluru against Pune Warriors in April 2013.
Article Summary: Vaibhav suryavanshi becomes youngest-ever centurion in ipl history. The prodigy from samastipur raced to his maiden century in just 35 balls. He scored 101 off 38 deliveries before being dismissed by prasidh krishna.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, RR vs GT: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text: Vaibhav Suryavanshi, a 14-year-old prodigy, etched his name in IPL history by smashing the fastest century by an Indian in the IPL. His explosive 101 off 38 balls propelled Rajasthan Royals to an eight-wicket victory over Gujarat Titans. Suryavanshi's record-breaking innings, laced with 11 sixes, overshadowed Shubman Gill's 84, reviving Rajasthan's playoff aspirations.
Article Summary: Vaibhav suryavanshi smashed the fastest century by an indian in the ipl. His explosive 101 off 38 balls propelled rajasthan royals to an eight-wicket victory over gujarat titans. The 14-year-old prodigy's record-breaking innings, laced with 11 sixes, overshadowed shubman gill's 84.

Article Title: 'Sanjiv Goenka never said anything wrong, KL Rahul was ... ': Ex-LSG star drops bombshell
Article Text:
KL Rahul and Sanjiv Goenka (Image credit: BCCI/IPL)



Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll What should be LSG's focus for the remaining matches? Focusing on individual player form and consistency. Strengthening team chemistry and performance

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation’s Pulse

NEW DELHI: There has been a lot of chatter among cricket fans regarding Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) owner Sanjiv Goenka 's strict approach. Many believe Goenka demands strong results from his team. The discussions intensified recently after Goenka’s interactions with Rishabh Pant following LSG’s defeats sparked fresh speculation.The conversation around Goenka’s involvement began last year when he was seen having a heated discussion with then-captain KL Rahul after LSG’s heavy loss to SunRisers Hyderabad. Eventually, KL Rahul moved on from LSG and joined Delhi Capitals for the IPL 2025 season.However, former LSG spinner Amit Mishra offered clarification, describing Goenka as a friendly and approachable figure who simply wants the best for his team."I spoke to the coach last season, and he told me that captain KL Rahul was doing all the work. He was making the 11s, making all the changes, and planning. But this year, I don't feel like that. This year, after Zaheer Khan has come, I feel like he is talking to everyone. If you see, there is a discussion going on, they are talking to each other. With Digvesh Rathi the coach was talking," Mishra said on Cricbuzz."If you talk about the owner, I never felt he was too involved. Of course, he wanted the team to win. But we did lose matches and after that he never talked loudly or said anything wrong. I feel that the media has shown a little too much. I didn't feel that there was anything negative like that. But if there is any owner, he says that losing is okay, but just go out there and show some fight."Fight and lose, I have no problem. This is what people told me. This is what happened. Even after losing badly in Kolkata and Hyderabad, the owner came into the dressing room and motivated the team. He never said anything wrong or in a very high tone," he further added.As things stand, LSG are sixth on the points table with 5 wins and 5 losses from 10 matches.
Article Summary: There has been a lot of chatter about lucknow super giants owner sanjiv goenka. Lsg are sixth on the points table with 5 wins and 5 losses from 10 matches. Former lsg spinner amit mishra offered clarification, describing goenka as a friendly and approachable figure who simply wants the best for his team.

Article Title: Why Los Angeles Lakers GM Rob Pelinka could trade LeBron James for $186 million Milwaukee Bucks superstar
Article Text:
LeBron James and Luka Doncic (Image via Getty Images)

Los Angeles Lakers

general manager

Rob Pelinka

LeBron James

Giannis Antetokounmpo



Why the Los Angeles Lakers Might Consider Trading LeBron James for Giannis Antetokounmpo

"Rob Pelinka could decide to ignore any loyalty to LeBron and trade the 40-year-old star to the Bucks for Giannis Antetokounmpo, thereby creating a Luka-Giannis pairing that would be more potent than the current Luka-LeBron duo."

The Mechanics of a Potential Trade

LeBron James (Image Credit: Getty Images)

Key Factor



Details



LeBron’s Player Option



LeBron James holds a $52.6M option for 2025-26. If he opts in, he can veto any trade due to his no-trade clause.



New Contract Possibility



If LeBron signs a new deal without a no-trade clause, the Los Angeles Lakers could move him mid-season.



Salary Matching



A third team may be needed to balance salaries, as Giannis Antetokounmpo is owed $121.2M over the next two years.





Why the Bucks Might Entertain This Deal

has never been afraid of bold moves. After pulling off a blockbuster trade for Luka Dončić earlier this year, he might be eyeing another franchise-altering deal—one that could seeshipped to the Milwaukee Bucks in exchange forThe Los Angeles Lakers' current season appears to be ending in disappointment, with a first-round exit looming. While most expect the team to retool around Dončić and James, Rob Pelinka could opt for a more aggressive approach. LeBron’s Age vs. Giannis’ Prime: At 40, LeBron is still elite, but Giannis is 30 and in his peak years.- Long-Term Success: A Dončić-Antetokounmpo duo could dominate the league for years.- Bucks’ Desperation: With Damian Lillard’s Achilles injury, Milwaukee’s championship window may have closed, pushing Giannis Antetokounmpo toward a trade request.As Colin Keane of Sporting News noted in the original report:For this deal to happen, several financial and contractual hurdles must be cleared.While trading Giannis for an aging LeBron seems lopsided, Milwaukee’s situation is complicated.- Giannis’ Trade Demand: If he requests a move, the Bucks lose leverage.- Marketing Boost: LeBron’s star power keeps Milwaukee relevant during a rebuild.- Future Planning: The Bucks may need to reset their roster for the 2030s.Rob Pelinka has a history of making unexpected moves, and this one would be his biggest yet. While trading LeBron James seems unthinkable, pairing Dončić with Giannis Antetokounmpo could secure the Los Angeles Lakers ’ future. Meanwhile, the Bucks might see value in acquiring a legend like LeBron James, even if only for a short-term boost.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could reel in $48 million Milwaukee Bucks star to support LeBron James and Luka Doncic in title push One thing is certain—if this trade happens, the NBA landscape will shift dramatically.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers could trade lebron james to the milwaukee bucks in exchange for giannis antetokounmpo. Rob pelinka has a history of making unexpected moves, and this one would be his biggest yet. A luka dončić-giannis pairing would be more potent than the current luka-lebron duo.

Article Title: Jacksonville Jaguars’ 2025 draft blunder: Skipping defensive tackle could ruin their season
Article Text:
Defensive struggles continue to haunt the Jaguars (Imagn Images)

Defensive struggles continue to haunt the Jaguars



Trusting the development of young defensive tackles

The 2025 NFL Draft has come and gone, and teams are now left to reflect on their selections and the holes they still need to fill. For the Jacksonville Jaguars , one glaring question remains: Why didn't they draft a defensive tackle despite their struggles on defense last season? The team’s decision not to address this need is raising eyebrows, especially given their poor performance in critical areas like run defense and pass rushing.The Jaguars' defense has been far from elite, ranking 31st in the NFL by allowing 5.9 yards per play last season. Adding to the concern, they were last in both pass yards allowed and forced turnovers, with a dismal total of only nine takeaways. The interior defensive line has been particularly problematic, struggling to stop the run and pressure the quarterback. This led many to believe that the team would use their draft picks to bolster the defensive tackle position.However, Jacksonville's front office took a different approach. Despite these glaring defensive issues, general manager James Gladstone explained that the team chose not to "reach for a player" at defensive tackle. This decision suggests a strong belief in the young players already on the roster and a commitment to developing them further in Year 2.The Jaguars are putting their trust in young defensive tackles Maason Smith and Jordan Jefferson to improve their performances. Smith, in particular, showed promise towards the end of the 2024 season, recording two sacks and three tackles for loss over the final three games. The team hopes this momentum will carry over into the new season, providing the interior rush that has been lacking.Additionally, the move to shift Arik Armstead back inside from defensive end is expected to give the defensive line a boost. Armstead’s versatility and experience could provide the needed push for the Jaguars' defensive front to perform better against both the run and the pass.Also Read: “Have lost faith in Justin Tucker”: Ravens’ decision to draft Tyler Loop hints at the end of Justin Tucker’s future in the team amidst his ongoing scandal This decision may be a gamble, but the Jaguars are confident in the potential of their younger players. By avoiding the defensive tackle position in the draft, they are sending a message that they believe their existing talent can rise to the occasion. Only time will tell if this strategy will pay off, or if it will come back to haunt them as they face more powerful offenses in 2025.
Article Summary: The jaguars' defense has been far from elite, ranking 31st in the nfl by allowing 5.9 yards per play last season. The interior defensive line has been particularly problematic, struggling to stop the run and pressure the quarterback. Despite these glaring defensive issues, general manager james gladstone explained that the team chose not to "reach for a player" at defensive tackle.

Article Title: WWE WrestleMania 42 match early predictions: Superstars that are set to shine in New Orleans
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Roman Reigns vs The Rock

Cody Rhodes vs CM Punk

Bianca Belair vs Jade Cargill

Becky Lynch vs Bayley

The Usos vs The Lucha Bros

Jacob Fatu vs Drew McIntyre

Jey Uso vs Bron Breakker

With the curtains just falling on WWE WrestleMania 41, fans are already looking ahead to next year's mega event. WWE WrestleMania 42 is set to take place at the Caesars Superdome in New Orleans on April 11-12, 2026, and our early predictions suggest a star-studded lineup that could shape the future of the company.One of the most anticipated clashes is a potential dream match between Roman Reigns and The Rock. Long discussed but never executed, this battle of cousins could finally materialise as Reigns nears the final stages of his WWE career.Another major headline could see Cody Rhodes square off against CM Punk for the WWE Championship. After their fiery exchanges over the past two Royal Rumble seasons, this match feels inevitable, with fans eager to see these two superstars go head to head in a fierce battle.On the women's side, a heated rivalry between Bianca Belair and Jade Cargill is brewing. Having already made waves in WWE, Cargill could challenge Belair in what promises to be a high-impact encounter for the Women’s Championship.Meanwhile, Becky Lynch and Bayley could finally settle their score after WrestleMania 41’s dramatic reshuffle, with a title clash very much on the cards.Tag team wrestling also looks set for a big moment. A showdown between The Usos and The Lucha Bros could be an amazing sight to watch, offering fans a high-octane match featuring some of the industry's finest teams.New stars are expected to shine as well. Rising powerhouse Jacob Fatu could be on a collision course with Drew McIntyre for a world title match, showcasing a clash of brute strength and raw popularity.Bron Breakker may step up to challenge Jey Uso for the World Heavyweight Championship under the guidance of Paul Heyman, potentially marking his arrival as a top-tier star.With several returns, debuts, and dream matches potentially on the horizon, WrestleMania 42 promises to be a celebration of WWE’s past, present, and future. While a lot can change in a year, the early signs point towards an unforgettable two-night spectacular event in New Orleans.Fans will be watching closely as storylines develop in the coming months, with the Road to WrestleMania 42 already beginning to take shape.
Article Summary: Wwe wrestlemania 42 is set to take place in new orleans on april 11-12, 2026. Early predictions suggest a star-studded lineup that could shape the future of the company. Roman reigns vs the rock and cody rhodes vs cm punk are among the most anticipated clashes.

Article Title: Top 5 best managers in WWE History
Article Text:
Image via WWE

5. Paul Bearer

4. Freddie Blassie

3. Bobby Heenan

2. Jimmy Hart

1. Paul Heyman

In WWE’s history, managers have played a crucial role in shaping the careers of some of the biggest superstars. Whether it was by cutting unforgettable promos, masterminding heel turns, or simply offering an imposing ringside presence, the best managers left an unforgettable memory on the industry. Here’s a look at the top five who stood out the most.Few managers understood their characters better than Paul Bearer. With his haunting voice and fantastic persona, Bearer perfectly complemented The Undertaker, Kane, and Mankind. His ability to create fear and suspense added a new dimension to the supernatural storylines of WWE’s New Generation Era. Whether carrying the funerary urn or plotting revenge against his former allies, Bearer’s intelligence and psychological games made him unforgettable.“Classy” Freddie Blassie brought street-smart wisdom to his managerial career after retiring from the ring. Blassie’s association with villains like The Iron Sheik, Kamala, and King Kong Bundy elevated their careers in a period when foreign heel gimmicks dominated. His sharp mind and unapologetic behaviour set the blueprint for what a manager could achieve in the early days of WWE.Bobby Heenan’s nickname, “The Brain,” wasn’t just for show. Heenan expertly manipulated situations to favor his clients, which included legends like Andre the Giant, Rick Rude, and Mr. Perfect. His managerial stable, The Heenan Family, was one of the most formidable forces in WWE. Whether distracting referees or cutting razor-sharp promos, Heenan's contributions to WWE’s golden era remain unmatched.Known for his trademark megaphone and flashy jackets, Jimmy Hart was a relentless force during WWE’s 1980s boom. Hart managed multiple iconic acts like the Hart Foundation, Honky Tonk Man, and Money Inc. His ability to generate heat for heels and occasionally pivot to managing babyfaces like Hulk Hogan showcased his versatile brilliance.Paul Heyman has continuously reinvented himself across eras, managing champions like Brock Lesnar, CM Punk, and Roman Reigns. Heyman’s deep understanding of storytelling and character work has made him a genius strategist. His alliances with Roman Reigns and Seth Rollins have further solidified his reputation as perhaps the smartest man behind the mic in WWE history.While wrestlers often get the spotlight, these managers played just as important a role in WWE’s success stories. They crafted narratives, enhanced performances, and created unforgettable moments that still resonate with fans today. As WWE evolves, the legacy of these iconic managers continues to inspire a new generation of characters looking to make their mark both inside and outside the ring.
Article Summary: The top five managers in wwe history are: paul bearer, bobby heenan, freddie blassie, jimmy hart, and paul heyman. Bearer's haunting voice and fantastic persona perfectly complemented the undertaker, kane, and mankind. Blassies association with villains like the iron sheik, kamala, and king kong bundy elevated their careers.

Article Title: Trae Young drops heartfelt 5-word reaction to Damian Lillard's latest injury
Article Text:
(Image Source - Getty Images)

Damian Lillard's injury casts a shadow over Milwaukee Bucks' playoff hopes

During Game 4 against Indiana Pacers Damian Lillard suffered an ankle injury to his left ankle which forced him to leave the match due to a potential serious medical concern. The Bucks face severe danger in the playoffs with a 3-1 deficit in the series after their loss made them fall to 2-1. The team along with its supporters awaits the results of Lillard's MRI while staying alert about a crucial postseason change.During Game 4 of the 2025 NBA Playoffs Milwaukee Bucks star Damian Lillard sustained an ankle injury to his left foot shortly after the first quarter started versus Indiana Pacers. Lillard experienced unbearable pain by holding his leg as medical staff had to help him off the court before he lost the ability to stand on his left foot. The Bucks team doctors announced Lillard's absence from the game which medical examinations suggested damages to his Achilles tendon. The evaluation of Lillard's injury will be performed through an MRI scan to identify its severity.This is a real tough break for Lillard, who had only just made his comeback after being diagnosed with deep vein thrombosis in his right calf in March. That kept him out for the end of the regular season, but he was finally cleared to play right before the playoffs kicked off. His return in Game 2 was a big deal, showing he could overcome challenges, but now this new injury has everyone worried about his health and the Bucks' shot at the championship.After Lillard left the game, the Bucks had a tough time keeping their energy up. Giannis Antetokounmpo was the standout with 28 points and 15 rebounds, but without Lillard, their offense just didn't have the same fire. The Pacers took full advantage, with Myles Turner putting up 23 points and Tyrese Haliburton adding 17 points, 15 assists, and 8 rebounds. Indiana shot better than 60% from the field and kept a solid lead the whole game, finishing with a 129-103 win."This is a tough one, honestly. Blood clot, followed by [Achilles]. ... He's just a great freakin' dude, as a teammate and a father. No one deserves it." Doc Rivers speaks on Damian Lillard.This incident shocked everyone, according to NBA insider Chris Haynes said that this left Achilles tear for Lillard and even Trae Young said this on twitter, “🙏🏽😞 Pray for Dame man !!!”The Milwaukee Bucks face a crucial Game 5 match in Indianapolis under the shadow of Damian Lillard's injury status. Without their star guard the team faces an immense challenge for which Giannis Antetokounmpo along with the other players must rise to the occasion.Also Read: “Kobe Bryant would never” — Fans rip LeBron James for smiling with Anthony Edwards and Mike Conley The upcoming Game 5 series decider will test the Bucks at their absolute limits because it stands as their most crucial contest thus far. The results of Game 5 could determine whether the Bucks move on in the playoffs and shape their chances at winning championships beyond this season.
Article Summary: Milwaukee bucks star damian lillard sustained an ankle injury to his left foot during game 4 against indiana pacers. Lillard experienced unbearable pain by holding his leg as medical staff had to help him off the court. The bucks team doctors announced lillard's absence from the game which medical examinations suggested damages to his achilles tendon.

Article Title: 'Hardik Pandya & his little Paltan': Mumbai Indians captain's special moment with a young fan wins hearts - Watch
Article Text:
Hardik Pandya (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How impressed are you with Mumbai Indians' recent performance? Not Impressed Neutral Somewhat Impressed Very Impressed

WATCH:

NEW DELHI: Mumbai Indians continued their remarkable resurgence in the Indian Premier League 2025 season, securing a commanding 54-run victory over Lucknow Super Giants at the Wankhede Stadium on Sunday.The triumph marked MI's fifth consecutive win, lifting them to third in the ten-team points table with 12 points from 10 matches, firmly placing them in the playoff race after a rocky start where they managed just one win in their first five games.Also See: GT vs RR The post-match celebrations at Wankhede were electric, with thousands of young Mumbai Indians supporters creating a festive atmosphere. In a touching moment that won hearts across social media, MI captain Hardik Pandya stole the spotlight.During the team's lap of honour after the win, Hardik crossed the advertising boards and personally handed his cap to a young fan standing by the barricades. The spontaneous gesture sparked a massive roar from the crowd, especially the young "Paltan," and the video of the moment quickly went viral online.Mumbai Indians shared the emotional clip with the caption: “Hardik & his little Paltan,” capturing the spirit of connection between the team and its supporters.With momentum firmly on their side, Hardik's rejuvenated Mumbai Indians will next face Rajasthan Royals in Jaipur, looking to extend their winning streak and inch closer to securing a playoff berth with two more victories needed from their remaining four games.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians beat lucknow super giants by 54 runs at the wankhede stadium. Victory marks mi's fifth consecutive win and lifts them to third in the table. Mi captain hardik pandya personally handed his cap to a young fan during the lap of honour.

Article Title: Sanjiv Goenka memes flood internet again after Rishabh Pant flop show
Article Text:
Sanjiv Goenka and Rishabh Pant

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation’s Pulse

Timir Biswas performs in Kolkata

NEW DELHI: Rishabh Pant ’s struggles with the bat continued as he fell cheaply once again, this time against the Mumbai Indians at Wankhede Stadium on Sunday.Pant managed just four runs off two balls before playing a poor shot that ended his stay. Trying a risky reverse sweep off Will Jacks, he mistimed it completely and handed an easy catch to Karn Sharma at short third man.Pant, captaining the Lucknow Super Giants this season, has found it tough going.He has scored only 110 runs in 10 matches, with just one notable innings of 63 runs. With these numbers, Pant is staring at what could be his lowest IPL return since 2016.Also See: DC vs RCB IPL Live Score After a strong comeback season last year, where he piled up 446 runs for Delhi Capitals, expectations were high, especially after LSG signed him for Rs 27 crore, making him the most expensive player in IPL history.Pant's failure triggered a wave of memes featuring Sanjiv Goenka , the LSG co-owner, across social media.Meanwhile, Mumbai Indians put up a strong total of 215/7, thanks to explosive half-centuries from Ryan Rickelton (58 off 25) and Suryakumar Yadav (54 off 28).Rickelton smashed the season’s fastest half-century for MI, while Suryakumar became the season’s highest scorer with 417 runs in 10 innings.LSG’s bowlers struggled under the Mumbai heat and humidity, though Mayank Yadav and Avesh Khan managed two wickets each. Prince Yadav, Digvesh Rathi, and Ravi Bishnoi chipped in with a wicket apiece, but it wasn’t enough to halt MI's charge.With Pant’s form dipping and LSG's playoff hopes in question, the pressure is clearly mounting -- both on the field and across the internet.
Article Summary: Rishabh pant fails with the bat for lucknow super giants against mumbai indians. Pant managed just four runs off two balls before playing a poor shot that ended his stay. Mumbai indians put up a strong total of 215/7, thanks to explosive half-centuries from ryan rickelton (58 off 25) and suryakumar yadav (54 off 28).

Article Title: Ravichandran Ashwin conferred Padma Shri by President Droupadi Murmu - WATCH
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

WATCH:

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation’s Pulse

NEW DELHI: Former Indian cricketer Ravichandran Ashwin was conferred with the Padma Shri by President Droupadi Murmu during a ceremony at Rashtrapati Bhavan on Monday. The BCCI shared a video of Ashwin receiving the honour on its official X handle. The Padma Shri is India’s fourth-highest civilian award, following the Bharat Ratna, Padma Vibhushan, and Padma Bhushan.Recognised as one of India's finest spin bowlers, Ashwin received the prestigious honour for his outstanding contribution to cricket.Ashwin played a crucial role in India’s triumphs at the 2011 ODI World Cup and the 2013 Champions Trophy.In Test cricket, Ashwin boasts 537 wickets from 106 matches, making him India’s second-highest wicket-taker in the format. He has also scored 3,503 runs, including six centuries, showcasing his prowess as an all-rounder.Across limited-overs formats, Ashwin has picked up 156 wickets in ODIs and 72 wickets in T20Is.He retired from international cricket last year after India's Boxing Day Test against Australia at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.Currently, Ashwin continues to feature in domestic cricket, representing Chennai Super Kings in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 season.
Article Summary: Ravichandran ashwin received the padma shri at rashtrapati bhavan on monday. Ashwin played a crucial role in india’s triumphs at the 2011 odi world cup and 2013 champions trophy. He retired from international cricket last year after india's boxing day test against australia.

Article Title: “This needs to consume your life to be great”: John Cena opens up about his retirement from WWE in 2025
Article Text:
(Image via WWE)

John Cena opens up about his retirement from WWE

John Cena Is Going To Make The WWE ‘START OVER’

17-TIME! John Cena defeats Cody Rhodes to break title record: WrestleMania 41 Sunday highlights

Also Read

John Cena, the newly crowned Undisputed Champion, who is currently on his retirement tour, has shared some significant information related to his retirement from WWE after such a successful career in the company for almost 25 years.The Cenation leader, who was seen at WrestleMania 41 on April 20, 2025, and won the title against The American Nightmare Cody Rhodes at the WWE Undisputed Championship, will say goodbye to the ring this year in December.Regarding this Cena very candidly opened up about his retirement and shared his opinion about it. Let’s find out what the Cenation leader has to say about his farewell.In a candid interview with ESPN, John Cena has opened up about his retirement and emphasized the dedication required to excel in the wrestling industry. While speaking with ESPN, the 17-time WWE World Champion opened up about his retirement and focusing on dedication to playing wrestling.He said, "This needs to consume your life to be great, not only consume your life, but you really have to be curious, passionate, open, humble. I can only imagine that if you are not fully focused, coachable, and 100% involved in fight training. So, in me trying to split time and thinking that I can do both, I just did this a lot less and less and was used accordingly."Cena also discussed the natural progression of a wrestler's career, noting, "As you are ushered on the way out, you're supposed to build all this energy and then give it away. That's the cycle of life in sports entertainment.”He further added, “If you leave with the energy, you have robbed the business. So me saying this over and over again, I was like, 'Man, I haven't won a match since this [time]. I'm 48 next week,' so I was like, 'Oh man, it's time to retire.' That's when I was like, 'I'd like to do this farewell tour.’”Despite his losses over the years, Cena seems to be in a winning streak with Elimination Chamber 2025 and now with WrestleMania 41 , becoming a 17-time WWE World Champion in the history of professional wrestling .As Cena approaches his 48th birthday, he remains resolute in his decision to retire, aiming to conclude his in-ring career with integrity and respect for the sport. Though Cena reigns as the Undisputed WWE Champion, he will be next seen against Randy Orton, becoming his first challenger.
Article Summary: The cenation leader, who was seen at wrestlemania 41 on april 20, 2025, and won the title against the american nightmare cody rhodes at the wwe undisputed championship. While speaking with espn, the 17-time wwe world champion opened up about his retirement and focusing on dedication to playing wrestling.

Article Title: IPL match today, RR vs GT: Playing XI Prediction, head-to-head, Sawai Mansingh Stadium pitch report, weather in Jaipur
Article Text:
Rajasthan Royals players

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. Poll Do you think Rajasthan Royals will make it to the playoffs? No, it's too late. Yes, they can recover. Pitch report for RR vs GT Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation’s Pulse RR vs GT Playing XI Prediction Rajasthan Royals predicted XI: Impact Player Gujarat Titans predicted XI: Impact Player Poll Who do you think will win the match between Gujarat Titans and Rajasthan Royals? Match will be abandoned It's too close to call Rajasthan Royals Gujarat Titans RR vs GT squads, IPL match Today Rajasthan Royals: Gujarat Titans: RR vs GT Head-to-Head Record RR vs GT IPL 2025 , Jaipur weather prediction In red-hot form, Gujarat Titans will look to tighten their grip on the top spot and edge closer to a playoff berth when they face Rajasthan Royals in the Indian Premier League on Monday. Perched atop the 10-team table with six wins from eight matches, the Shubman Gill-led Titans require just two more victories to seal qualification.Functioning like a well-oiled machine, Gujarat have lost only twice this season. Sai Sudharsan and Prasidh Krishna have been standout performers, leading the Orange and Purple Cap races, respectively. Gill, Sudharsan, and Jos Buttler have each amassed over 300 runs at strike rates exceeding 150, showcasing consistency and firepower.Despite Kagiso Rabada’s early departure, Gujarat’s bowling has flourished. Prasidh has claimed 16 wickets at a stunning average of 14.12, while Mohammed Siraj and R Sai Kishore have picked up 12 wickets each, providing crucial breakthroughs.In stark contrast, Rajasthan Royals are almost out of the playoffs race following a narrow loss to Royal Challengers Bengaluru. With five consecutive defeats, the Royals are ninth on the table. While Yashasvi Jaiswal, Riyan Parag, and Nitish Rana have shown promise, their bowling failures have left them playing for pride in their remaining games.The Royals have lost both their home matches so far — by nine wickets against RCB and by two runs against LSG. At the Sawai Mansingh Stadium , the square boundaries measure 67m and 63m, with a straight boundary of 73m. The pitch offers an even covering of grass, suggesting good pace and bounce for the fast bowlers. However, with a few bare patches and a hot day ahead, the surface is expected to be dry. A par score at this venue is around 185, and any team reaching that mark should be well-placed to secure a win.Yashasvi Jaiswal, Shubham Dubey, Nitish Rana, Riyan Parag (c), Dhruv Jurel (wk), Shimron Hetmyer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Jofra Archer, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Sandeep Sharma, Tushar Deshpande– Vaibhav SuryavanshiSai Sudharsan, Shubman Gill (c), Jos Buttler (wk), Sherfane Rutherford, Rahul Tewatia, Washington Sundar, Shahrukh Khan, Rashid Khan, Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore, Prasidh Krishna, Mohammed Siraj- Ishant SharmaYashasvi Jaiswal, Riyan Parag (capt), Nitish Rana, Dhruv Jurel, Shimron Hetmyer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Jofra Archer, Maheesh Theekshana, Sandeep Sharma, Tushar Deshpande, Shubham Dubey, Kumar Kartikeya, Yudhvir Singh Charak, Kunal Singh Rathore, Akash Madhwal, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Kwena Maphaka, Ashok Sharma, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Sanju Samson.Shubman Gill (Captain), Jos Buttler (wk), B Sai Sudharsan, Shahrukh Khan, Sherfane Rutherford, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, Kagiso Rabada, Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore, Mohammad Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Ishant Sharma, Washington Sundar, Glenn Phillips, Anuj Rawat, Mahipal Lomror, Arshad Khan, Jayant Yadav, Nishant Sindhu, Kulwant Khejroliya, Gerald Coetzee, Manav Suthar, Kumar Kushagra, Gurnoor Brar and Karim Janat.Played: 7RR wins: 1GT wins: 6It is expected to be extremely warm at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur on Monday with temperatures reaching a high of 41 degrees Celsius and low of 27 degrees. There are 0% chances of rain. In the evening it is expected to see temperatures hovering around 30 degrees Celsius.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans face rajasthan royals in the indian premier league. Shubman gill-led titans are top of the table with six wins from eight matches. Rajastha royals are ninth in the table after five consecutive defeats. Match will be abandoned due to bad weather.

Article Title: Who is Karim Janat, the new weapon in Shubman Gill's Gujarat Titans arsenal?
Article Text:
Image credit: Gujarat Titans

Playing XIs:

Gujarat Titans:

Rajasthan Royals:

Impact Substitutes:

Who is Karim Janat

?

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation’s Pulse

NEW DELHI: Rajasthan Royals captain Riyan Parag won the toss and elected to bowl first against Gujarat Titans in their IPL 2025 clash at the Sawai Mansingh Stadium in Jaipur on Monday. Rajasthan Royals are currently ninth on the points table, having managed just two wins from nine matches. In contrast, Gujarat Titans sit second with 12 points, registering six wins and two losses from eight games. A victory on Monday would propel them to the top of the table.Rajasthan Royals made two changes to their playing XI."We'll bowl first. Pretty similar wicket to the one we played against LSG. Should be a good wicket, some low bounce, saw some dew last night so bowling first. Everyone in our team has gone through situations like this and they know how to get out of it. We've had honest talks. Just have to put a game together collectively and hope for a good result. We've played 35 overs of good cricket in the last three games. That's how cruel the IPL is. Two changes: Farooqi goes out, Theekshana comes in. Tushar goes out and Yudhvir comes in," Parag said at the toss.Meanwhile, Gujarat Titans, the 2022 champions, made one change to their XI."Would've bowled first as well. But it looks like a good wicket. Some grass on the wicket, always nice to see that. We are looking to take each game as it is, not looking at the past. Important to be ruthless in this format. One change: Karim Janat makes his debut," GT captain Shubman Gill said.Sai Sudharsan, Shubman Gill (c), Jos Buttler (w), Washington Sundar, Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia, Karim Janat, Rashid Khan, Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh KrishnaYashasvi Jaiswal, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, Nitish Rana, Riyan Parag (c), Dhruv Jurel (w), Shimron Hetmyer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Jofra Archer , Maheesh Theekshana, Sandeep Sharma, Yudhvir Singh CharakGujarat Titans: Ishant Sharma, Mahipal Lomror, Anuj Rawat, Arshad Khan, Dasun ShanakaRajasthan Royals: Shubham Dubey, Kumar Kartikeya, Akash Madhwal, Tushar Deshpande, Kunal Singh RathoreKarim Janat is a talented Afghan cricketer renowned for his all-round abilities, excelling as a right-handed batsman and a right-arm medium-fast bowler. Born on August 11, 1998, in Kabul, Afghanistan, he has been a key part of the national setup since making his debut in 2016.Janat made an impressive start to his international career in a T20I against the United Arab Emirates on December 14, 2016, claiming three wickets and scoring 25 runs to earn the Player of the Match award. He made his ODI debut against Zimbabwe on February 24, 2017, and later stepped into Test cricket on June 14, 2023, against Bangladesh.In T20Is, Janat has featured in 67 matches, amassing 691 runs at an average of 17.71, including four half-centuries, and taking 42 wickets at an average of 27.14, with best bowling figures of 5/11. His first-class record is equally impressive, with 1,906 runs at an average of 52.94, including five centuries and ten fifties, alongside 73 wickets at an average of 34.32.Janat has also showcased his skills in various domestic and franchise leagues, representing teams like the Colombo Stars in the Lanka Premier League and the Comilla Victorians in the Bangladesh Premier League. As of 2025, he is part of the Gujarat Titans squad in the Indian Premier League.
Article Summary: Rajasthan royals captain riyan parag won the toss and elected to bowl first against gujarat titans in their ipl 2025 clash at the sawai mansingh stadium in jaipur on monday. Rajasthan are currently ninth on the points table, having managed just two wins from nine matches.

Article Title: 'Auction missteps behind CSK's struggles': Ajay Jadeja dissects MS Dhoni-led side's IPL 2025 campaign
Article Text:
Chennai Super Kings

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll What do you think was the main factor behind CSK's poor performance in IPL 2025? Loss of team morale Injuries to key players Frequent changes in playing XI Ineffective auction strategy

NEW DELHI: Former India cricketer Ajay Jadeja has attributed Chennai Super Kings ' dismal IPL 2025 campaign to their failure at last year’s auction, calling it the starting point of their sharp decline.Also visit: IPL Live Score Speaking during a JioStar Expert interaction, Jadeja, a self-proclaimed fan of both CSK and Mumbai Indians , reflected on the franchise's emotional high in 2024 after their 2023 title win."The last one was probably more emotional. Sometimes when you win, you stick to the same players, hoping it’ll happen again. But there was a curve that was heading down," Jadeja remarked.Pointing directly at the auction strategy, Jadeja said, "I think that the auction was where you could see that they did not have the firepower most other teams acquired. That was probably the key to start with. Naturally, when things don't go well, you lose."CSK, known for backing their players through rough patches, have appeared uncharacteristically unsettled this season with frequent changes to their playing XI - a departure from their tried-and-tested formula. Jadeja highlighted this shift, referencing the franchise’s past faith in players like Shane Watson."Chennai would stick. Watson struggled all the way to the final, but he still played all the games. This year, Conway came for three games, Rachin is now out. So that is something new. Maybe because of the uncertainty at the auction, this is what we are seeing," he explained.With CSK languishing at the bottom of the points table, Jadeja’s words strike at the heart of their struggles.
Article Summary: Former india cricketer ajay jadeja has attributed chennai super kings'dismal ipl 2025 campaign to their failure at last year’s auction. Jadeja: "i think that the auction was where you could see that they did not have the firepower most other teams acquired" csk languishing at the bottom of the points table.

Article Title: “It’s just extremely frustrating”- Dodgers’ star Tyler Glasnow shared his disappointment amid shoulder injury update
Article Text:
“It’s just extremely frustrating”- Dodgers’ star Tyler Glasnow shared his disappointment amid shoulder injury update (Image Source: Instagram)

Dodgers’ Tyler Glasnow feels bad for his teammates after his shoulder injury update

“Right now, yeah, just frustrated, I guess. It's just an extension trying to throw something grabbed. I think just making a lot of changes, trying to figure out a way to stay healthy, I think some of the changes have led to other things kind of taking over, and I'm just at this point I'm just trying to figure out what to do, and it's just extremely frustrating.”

“I think we're just going to try and figure it out. Give it a couple of days and see what it is, but I haven't really talked to him about a plan.”

Dodgers postgame: Tyler Glasnow dejected by right shoulder injury & feels bad for fans

"I just—it's been all I'm just, like, obsessed with trying to figure out what's going on. It's been like this for a few years, and like I've been trying to find a way to stay healthy. I'll try to. I'll do whatever. I just don't really have an answer right now."

“I think that's the most frustrating thing It's not like a lack of trying It's just kind of exhausting at this point. I know it's probably exhausting for a lot of people, especially for me. Like, I feel bad for my teammates. I feel bad for people watching. It's just, like, it's a whole very frustrating situation for me, and, like, it's hard.”

The 2025 MLB season started on a great note for the Los Angeles Dodgers , but the team roster has been plagued with injured players and frequent changes. Recently, Dodgers’ pitching star Tyler Glasnow made headlines after he went on to take a backseat due to sudden shoulder discomfort during a recent game with the Texas Rangers . Reportedly, he could pitch after the first inning and left in the middle of the game against the Rangers. Glasnow reacted to the shoulder injury update and even expressed his frustration, disappointment, and helplessness during an interview.During a postgame interview with the Dodger Blue, Tyler Glasnow opened up about his shoulder discomfort, which led to his untimely exit from the team roster during the ongoing MLB season. He said-On being asked about whether he has undergone an MRI for the shoulder discomfort, Glasnow said-Tyler Glasnow even addressed the media about the recurring nature of his injuries. He mentioned that he is trying to stay healthy in every possible way. The Dodgers' pitching star revealedHe further explained-From Mookie Betts ' illness during their opening day game in Tokyo to the starters Clayton Kershaw and Tony Gonsolin being out of the roster due to their rehab, the Los Angeles Dodgers are undoubtedly plagued with one injured athlete after another during the 2025 MLB season.Also Read: Dodgers suffer setback after Tyler Glasnow leaves the game against Rangers after first inning
Article Summary: “it’s just extremely frustrating”- dodgers’ star tyler glasnow shared his disappointment amid shoulder injury update. Glasnow made headlines after he went on to take a backseat due to sudden shoulder discomfort during a recent game with the texas rangers.

Article Title: Doc Rivers shares emotional message as Damian Lillard injury devastates Milwaukee Bucks after Game 4 loss
Article Text:
Image via Ethan Miller/Getty Images

Doc Rivers sends heartbreaking message after Damian Lillard's injury

The Milwaukee Bucks entered Sunday night’s playoff clash against the Indiana Pacers hoping to even up the series. Instead, their night ended in heartbreak. Not only did Milwaukee suffer a crushing 129 to 103 defeat in Game 4, but they also lost star guard Damian Lillard to a feared Achilles injury . It was a devastating blow that now leaves their season hanging by a thread.Milwaukee’s struggles deepened early in Sunday’s contest when Damian Lillard , who had recently returned after a month-long absence due to blood clot issues , went down with a non-contact injury just six minutes into the game. The initial fear from the Bucks' bench and later echoed by insiders was that the 33-year-old guard had suffered a torn Achilles.Following the game, head coach Doc Rivers was visibly shaken while speaking to reporters in Indiana. "I knew it right away," Rivers said, referring to the moment Lillard went down. "It is not very promising. I feel bad for him. The guy tried to come back for his team."Rivers did not stop there. He shared an emotional tribute to Lillard, not just as a player but as a person. "This is a tough one, honestly," Rivers added. "Blood clot, followed by Achilles. He is just a great freakin' dude, as a teammate and a father. No one deserves it."Before this latest setback, Lillard had been trying to find his rhythm after missing time. He posted 14 points and seven assists in Game 2 and added seven points and five assists in Game 3. Throughout the 2024 to 2025 NBA season, Lillard appeared in 58 games, averaging 24.9 points, 7.1 assists, 4.7 rebounds, and 1.2 steals per contest while shooting 44.8 percent from the field and 37.6 percent from three-point range.The Bucks' Game 4 loss now puts them down 3 to 1 in the first-round series against the Pacers. With their backs firmly against the wall, Milwaukee will travel to Indiana for a must-win Game 5 on Tuesday.Also Read: Milwaukee Bucks' Damian Lillard reveals nightmarish blood clot diagnosis and recovery journey as he returns for playoffs The Milwaukee Bucks still hold a faint hope of staying alive in the playoffs, but losing Lillard, both on the court and in the locker room, casts a heavy shadow over the team. Rivers’ emotional words after the game captured the deep sense of loss and heartbreak that’s hanging over the Bucks. It’s clear that things just aren’t the same without their leader.
Article Summary: Milwaukee bucks lost 129 to 103 to indiana pacers in game 4 of first-round series. Star guard damian lillard went down with a feared achilles injury just six minutes into the game. Head coach doc rivers was visibly shaken after the game and shared an emotional tribute to lillard.

Article Title: “Was spectacular”- Stephen A. Smith reacts to Jalen Brunson’s terrific performance against the Detroit Pistons
Article Text:
“Was spectacular”- Stephen A. Smith reacts to Jalen Brunson’s terrific performance against the Detroit Pistons, Image via- Getty Images and Instagram

Stephen A. Smith believes the NBA should fear the current version of Jalen Brunson

“Hey, it is what it is. Detroit lost this game, and Big Body Brunson, as you affectionately call it, was spectacular, got injured, came back, and still dropped an extra 15.”

NBA should fear this Jalen Brunson - Stephen A. Smith on Game 4 Knicks def. Pistons 94-93 for 3-1

“Playoff wins are tough. It’s hard to get them. We didn’t have much going our way to start the fourth and dug down and found a way to win.”

“In the end, a lot of tough plays, guys stepping up, KAT (Towns) hitting the big shots, Jalen (Brunson) big shots, Mikal’s (Bridges) defense, OG’s (Anunoby) defense, Josh’s (Hart) hustle plays, the rebounds we needed everybody, and just find a way to win. And that’s the bottom line.”

Tom Thibodeau on Jalen Brunson returning after injury, Knicks' Game 4 win

He came, he conquered, he left-—this particular saying goes extremely well for Jalen Brunson. The New York Knicks ’ talented shooting guard not only helped his club attain victory over the Detroit Pistons in a nail-biting face-off but also went on to earn praise from a few prominent faces in the NBA fraternity. During a recent appearance on ABC, ESPN’s NBA analyst Stephen A. Smith not only praised Jalen Brunson but also pointed out that the other NBA clubs should be careful about Brunson’s current version.New York Knicks’ star Jalen Brunson’s spectacular comeback has become the talk of the NBA world. As the Knicks defeated the Detroit Pistons, leading their way to the Eastern Conference first-round series, Brunson’s contribution and his killer instincts during the game brought the much-needed momentum for the New York Knicks. Reportedly, Jalen Brunson’s return from rehab during the middle of the game changed the trajectory of the match.ESPN’s prominent face, Stephen A. Smith, spoke about Brunson’s terrific performance and even sent out a message to all the other NBA teams with respect to the Knicks’ shooting guard. The NBA analyst said-New York Knicks coach Tom Thibodeau even reacted to the spellbinding performance by the team and as well as Jalen Brunson’s comeback. During a post-game press conference, he said-He further added-Game 4 of the series went on to bring the real action in the stadium, as during the fourth quarter Brunson went on to add 15 points with an injured ankle, whereas Karl-Anthony Towns contributed 27 points, leading the New York Knicks to defeat the Detroit Pistons with an overall score of 94-93, whereas Josh Hart secured 10 rebounds along with 14 points.Also Read: Detroit Pistons fend off Jalen Brunson’s dominance to edge New York Knicks in NBA playoff Game 2
Article Summary: New york knicks’ star jalen brunson’s spectacular comeback has become the talk of the nba world. The new york knicks defeated the detroit pistons, leading their way to the eastern conference first-round series. During the fourth quarter brunson went on to add 15 points with an injured ankle, whereas karl-anthony towns contributed 27 points.
